entry.title: How to organize a Vue app in a Rails project using Webpack
entry.summary: So, you’re a Rails developer, and you started to play with Vue (maybe using the CDN / ES5 way?), everything looks so exciting, you’re even thinking about using it in your next project. Great! And then problems start to pop up. How do I structure my files
